markdown:
**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 111 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- The carved [night hag's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=257) hand at the end of this sandalwood staff clutches a rough gem. The _staff of the Dreamlands_ makes it easier to navigate and survive in the [Dreamlands](/Planes.aspx?ID=22) and recognize its denizens. When wielding the staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks while in the Dreamlands and to checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about creatures with the [dream](/Traits.aspx?ID=299) trait. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of the Dreamlands **Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 111 **Price** 250 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
  • **1st** [_alarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [_déjà vu_](/Spells.aspx?ID=684), [_sleep_](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)
  • **2nd** [_phantasmal treasure_](/Spells.aspx?ID=707), [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287)
Staff of the Dreamlands (Greater) **Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 111 **Price** 2,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_dream message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=90)
  • **4th** _dream message_, [_nightmare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), sleep
  • **5th** [_dreaming potential_](/Spells.aspx?ID=91), [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161)
Staff of the Dreamlands (Major) **Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 111 **Price** 24,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **6th** _illusory scene_
  • **7th** [_project image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=237), [_visions of danger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=358)
  • **8th** [_dream council_](/Spells.aspx?ID=89), [_maze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), _visions of danger_
name: Staff of the Dreamlands (Greater)
